description: Simple and elegant, this poached pear recipe makes a scrumptious dessert. Creamy yoghurt and toasted muesli pair perfectly with fragrant poached pears.
name: Healthier Vanilla & Spice Poached Pears with Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Woolworths honey & cinnamon toasted muesli

recipeInstructions.text: Place pear juice, maple syrup, mixed spice and 2 cups water in a medium saucepan. Scrape vanilla seeds from the pod. Add both seeds and pod to saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium heat.

Peel and halve pears, leaving stems attached. Add pears to liquid and add more water, if needed, to cover. Cover surface with a round of baking paper (cut to the size of saucepan). Cover with lid, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 10 minutes or until pears are tender. Drain, reserving 1/3 cup cooking liquid.
Divide yoghurt among bowls. Top with pears and muesli. Drizzle with reserved cooking liquid and serve.
